nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration * 1000) AS 'Average Response Time' FROM Transaction WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT average(duration * 1000) AS 'Average Response Time (ms)' FROM Transaction WHERE appName like '%prod%'  SINCE 60 minutes ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT average(duration * 1000) as 'response time(ms)', count(*) from Transaction facet host where appName='hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT average(apm.service.overview.web) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod') FACET `segmentName` SINCE 1 hour AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'Web throughput (rpm)' FROM Metric WHERE (appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod') AND (transactionType = 'Web') SINCE 1 hour AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT average(databaseDuration)*1000 from Transaction TIMESERIES Where appName='hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT histogram(databaseDuration*300) from Transaction FACET name SINCE 60 minutes ago where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000  FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName like 'External%' AND appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO TIMESERIES facet metricTimesliceName
SELECT count(apm.service.transaction.external.duration) as 'External Services CPM' FROM Metric WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
SELECT average(duration) from Transaction FACET name where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT average(databaseDuration) from Transaction FACET name where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true) AS 'Error rate' FROM Transaction TIMESERIES SINCE 1800 seconds ago EXTRAPOLATE where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET transactionName where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET host where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT httpResponseCode, httpResponseMessage, error.class, error.message, transactionName, appName, host FROM TransactionError where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(cpuUserPercent) from SystemSample facet hostname limit MAX where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT average(cpuUserPercent) from SystemSample facet hostname limit MAX TIMESERIES  where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'

SELECT average(cpuSystemPercent) AS `Avg CPU System %`, average(cpuIOWaitPercent) AS `Avg CPU I/O Wait %`, average(cpuUserPercent) AS `Avg CPU User %`, average(cptStealPercent) AS `Avg CPU Steal %` FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT count(*), average(threadCount), average(cpuPercent), average(cpuSystemPercent) FROM ProcessSample FACET commandName limit MAX where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes) /1000000 AS 'Avg MB Used', average(memoryFreeBytes)/1000000 AS 'Avg MB Free' FROM SystemSample where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT average(memoryUsedPercent) AS `GB` FROM SystemSample FACET hostname LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT max(diskUsedPercent) as 'Percent Full' FROM StorageSample where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT average(receiveBytesPerSecond) as 'Inbound BW', average(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Outbound BW' FROM NetworkSample TIMESERIES where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT average(readBytesPerSecond) as 'Reads', average(writeBytesPerSecond) as 'Writes' FROM StorageSample TIMESERIES AUTO where apmApplicationNames like '%hcgov-app3-prod%'
SELECT average(duration) as `Avg Page Load`, percentile(duration,50) as `Median`, percentile(duration,95) as `Percentile` FROM PageView WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView TIMESERIES AUTO WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'

SELECT average(duration) from PageView facet regionCode TIMESERIES WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT average(duration) from PageView facet userAgentName TIMESERIES WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'

SELECT count(*) as `# Pages`,average(duration) as `AVG`,percentile(duration,50,75) as `%`,average(duration - backendDuration) as `Front`,average(backendDuration) as `Back`,average(connectionSetupDuration) as `Connection`,average(domProcessingDuration) as `DOM Processing`,average(pageRenderingDuration) as `Page Rendering` FROM PageView facet browserTransactionName WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT average(duration) from PageView facet browserTransactionName TIMESERIES WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'

SELECT count(*) as `# Pages`,average(duration) as `AVG`,percentile(duration,50,75) as `%`,average(duration - backendDuration) as `Front`,average(backendDuration) as `Back`,average(connectionSetupDuration) as `Connection`,average(domProcessingDuration) as `DOM Processing`,average(pageRenderingDuration) as `age Rendering` FROM PageView facet userAgentName, userAgentVersion WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'
SELECT average(duration) from PageView facet userAgentName,userAgentVersion TIMESERIES WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'

SELECT count(*) FROM  JavaScriptError FACET userAgentVersion SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 50 where appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod'

rawConfiguration.text:
# Database Monitoring

The queries for database monitoring will vary depending on the type of database and instrumentation available.  In general, the following KPIs can be used for most databases however, so please create charts for the below metrics:

* Current Connections
* Index counts & sizes
* Database storage utilization
* Query times & counts
* Number of queries & query times
* Buffer pool sizes (if applicable)
* Number of deadlocks (if applicable)
* Total Objects & Open Opjects (if applicable)

**NOTE - Please reach out to anewhouse@newrelic.com if you need assistance.**

# Availability
![Uptime](http://exergy-orc.com/upload/pages/253/exergy-geothermal-availability-icon.png)
### Website Availability
All components of the website must be up 99.99% of the time. 
### API Availability
All backend components of the website must be up and available 99.99% of the time.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') from SyntheticCheck since 1 Day ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') from SyntheticCheck since 1 week ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') from SyntheticCheck since 1 month ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') from SyntheticCheck since 1 Day ago

SELECT percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') from SyntheticCheck since 1 month ago

rawConfiguration.text:
# Performance

![Add Images](https://cdn4.iconfinder.com/data/icons/cooking/100/1-128.png)

### Website Performance
All webpages shall load in under: 
- 3 seconds measured at the 99th percentile
- 2 seconds measured at the 95th percentile
- 1 second measured at the 50th percentile

### API Performance
All APIs and backend components shall complete in under: 
- Less or equal to 700ms for 99th percent of the requests
- Less or equal to 500ms for 95th percent of the requests
- Less or equal to 300ms for 50th percent of the requests

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 99) AS '99th Percentile Page Load Time (s)', percentile(duration, 95) AS '95th Percentile Page Load Time (s)', percentile(duration, 50) AS '50th Percentile Page Load Time (s)' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' SINCE 1 day ago EXTRAPOLATE

SELECT percentile(duration, 99) AS '99th Percentile Page Load Time', percentile(duration, 95) AS '95th Percentile Page Load Time', percentile(duration, 50) AS '50th Percentile Page Load Time' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES 10 minutes SINCE 6 hours ago EXTRAPOLATE

SELECT percentile(duration * 1000, 99) AS '99th Percentile Response time (ms)', percentile(duration * 1000, 95) AS '95th Percentile Response time (ms)', percentile(duration * 1000, 50) AS '50th Percentile Response time (ms)' FROM Transaction WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' SINCE 1 day ago EXTRAPOLATE

SELECT percentile(duration * 1000, 99) AS '99th Percentile Response time', percentile(duration * 1000, 95) AS '95th Percentile Response time', percentile(duration * 1000, 50) AS '50th Percentile Response time' FROM Transaction WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES SINCE 6 hours ago EXTRAPOLATE

rawConfiguration.text:
# Load

![Add Images](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f5/Performance%2C_Web_Fundamentals.svg/120px-Performance%2C_Web_Fundamentals.svg.png)

### Website Load
The website should support 35000 concurrent users/hour while meeting all other SLAs

### API Load
All APIs should work successfully serving up to 2000 requests per second.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE appName = 'hcgov-app3-prod' since 1 day ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT count(*) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE appName ='hcgov-app3-prod'  SINCE 1 hour ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT uniqueCount(session) as 'Unique Sessions' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE appName ='hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES since 3 days ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) / 60 as 'page views per second' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE appName ='hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES SINCE 1 hour ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE appName ='hcgov-app3-prod' SINCE 24 hours ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) / 60 AS 'Requests per second' FROM Transaction WHERE appName ='hcgov-app3-prod' TIMESERIES SINCE 3 hours ago EXTRAPOLATE
